fields_of_interest: Culture and media, Consumers, Youth, Public Health, Digital economy and society
eu_initiatives:
Founding member and participant in the EU Platform on Diet, Physical Activity and Health. 
Consortium member of several EU-funded research projects. 
Recipient of an Operating Grant from the EU's 3rd Health Programme.
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: European Platform for Action on Diet, Physical Activity and Health#E00845#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=845#Member#C
relevant_communication: We run World Obesity Day (October 11th), organise training for health professionals in Europe and provide information and statistics of obesity and related issues on our website www.worldobesity.org.
goals__remit: World Obesity Federation represents professional members of the scientific, medical and research communities from over 50 regional and national obesity associations. Through our membership we create a global community of organisations dedicated to solving the problems of obesity. Our mission is to lead and drive global efforts to reduce, prevent and treat obesity.
